1.0.2.name: wordpress/dialogs
1.0.2.description:
Communicate with your Visitors

Show every content like Posts, Pages, Costom Post types in lightboxed Dialogs. Like in posts or pages, everything can be shown in a dialog. Add welcome screens, videos, forms, polls, just everything WordPress plugins offering you. Open dialogs by visiting a site or by using shortcode links.

Layout your dialogs

By using templates in your theme, style your and change the dialog appearance.

Features

  • Visual Editor
  • Text Editor
  • Visual Editor Button to add links for open dialogs
  • Open dialogs on site visits

Languages

Dialogs is multilingual:

  • English
  • German

Feel free to support the community. Send us your language files to team[at]themekraft.com and we we will add it in the next update!

Issue & Idea reporting

You have found a bug or you have great ideas? Let us know at
